item.description:
PARTY
The award-winning Boston Marriott Copley Place hotel is centrally located in the historic Back Bay district of Boston, MA. Minutes away from historic Trinity Church and Boston Common, this Boston hotel is perfect for business, weekend, and leisure travel. Whether looking to shop on Boston's ritzy Newbury Street or at the Copley Place mall, or to cheer on your favorite sports team at Fenway Park or the TD BankNorth Garden, the Marriott Copley Place is the ideal place to stay when in Boston.



On Saturday, February 20th, 2010, this will be the location of the biggest South Asian party in Boston! With a capacity of over 1,000 people, we look forward to celebrating in style after the South Asian Showdown!

This party will also go until 3 AM!!! You don't want to miss it!
Date: Saturday, February 20th, 2010
Time: 10 PM â€“ 3 AM!
Location: Marriot Grand Ballroom, 110 Huntington Street, Boston, MA 02116
DJ's: DJ Om, DJ MoDi, DJ Bombay, DJ RSB. More to be announced!

BUY TICKETS BEFORE IT'S TOO LATE!

item.name: Biggest Desi party this year.
